oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Tiffany Israel Oral History Interview, 2011 March 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Tiffany Israel conducted on March 25, 2011 by Andrea Blackman as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. The topics discussed include the volunteerism of Vanderbilt college students in flooded neighborhood.
The complete interview and transcript is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Israel, Tiffany, 1973- --Interviews
Vanderbilt University--Students--Anecdotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Israel, Tiffany, 1973- (Interviewee); Blackman, Andrea (Interviewer)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Excerpted from: Tiffany Israel Oral History Interview. Born-digital recording(s) converted to mp3 format for online access in 2012 from 16bit 44.1khz WAV file archival master recording.
